review: It does what its supposed to do and it does it well. No complaints.

review: Fire stick vs Apple tvI love my Apple TV more
author: Kimberly Trevino

review: Love it!  Much more than I expected!
author: Sarah Wooten

review: Exceeded my expectations works great, gives Apple TV a run for its money
author: Aldi D.

review: It took my son a while to get use to it but now I get my living room back. We both love it.
author: Calvin D

review: Love it, so easy to use
author: Laura

review: I have had my stick for 2 weeks. However, I am still not able to use it because it will not connect. So as of this point. I am very dissatisfied. I am still waiting for Amazon to get back to me to correct this problem.
author: Becky

review: I love my Amazon fire stick . I bought it at best buy along with a kindle paperwhite . Both good choices and I am pretty satisfied. I like the fact that it has a remote and compared with the remoteless chromecast, it was a deal breaker for me. I did love that it turns off or it suspends itself while there is inactivity of 30 minutes. I speficially use it for Netflix YouTube and Wwe network . I recommend to anyone who is looking for a streaming device for their home . Great price at $40
author: Karen Wolter
